products.title: Splash Solar Yellow Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Solar Yellow Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £8.83 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home!
This bright, sunny, yellow roller blind brightens any room, making this quality dimout made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Our roller blinds are great for privacy and light control, and come with sleek white components.
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.This yellow roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Still not sure? Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2056 Fabric Colour: Solar Yellow Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Rose Gold Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Rose Gold Roller Blind in Orange/Pink. Made to measure from £8.83 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Rose Gold is a beautiful colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder great for injecting colour into any room. Our Splash Rose Gold roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Our Roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2080 Fabric Colour: Rose Gold Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Mellow Yellow Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Mellow Yellow Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £9.35 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This pastel Mellow Yellow roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dusty yellow fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme. Our rollers are great for privacy and light control. At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This yellow roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
